# Built-in Dataset in R

## Aim

In order to facilitate the test preventing from creating a new set each time.

## Built-in Dataset

1.  Store in the package called: 'dataset'
2.  Use help(package='dataset') in console to get more information about the\
    package
3.  Type 'data()' in the console can reveal all the data
4.  Use 'data(package = .packages(all.available = TRUE))' in the console to\
    list the data sets in all *available* packages.
